short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switches between Google accounts based on time of day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Smart Account Switcher for Google Services

Seamlessly manage your work-life balance by automatically switching between your Google accounts based on your schedule. Perfect for professionals who use both personal and work Google accounts in the same browser.

## Key Features

• Schedule-Based Account Switching
Set your work hours once, and let the extension automatically direct you to the right Google account. Whether you're checking Calendar, Gmail, or Drive, you'll always land in the right workspace.

• Smart Context Recognition
Access your work account during business hours and your personal account during off-hours - no more accidentally sending emails from the wrong account or scheduling meetings in your personal calendar.

• Easy Configuration
Simply set your preferred work hours and assign your Google accounts. The extension handles the rest, making account management effortless and automatic.

• Supported Google Services
Works seamlessly with essential Google services including:
- Google Calendar
- Gmail
- Google Drive
- Google Meet
- Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides

## Perfect For
- Professionals working remotely or in hybrid settings
- Freelancers managing multiple client accounts
- Anyone juggling personal and work Google accounts

## Privacy & Security
Your account preferences and schedule settings are stored locally on your device. The extension doesn't collect or transmit any personal data or login information.

Stay productive and organized by ensuring you're always in the right Google account at the right time. Download Smart Account Switcher today and experience seamless account management based on your schedule.
